attributes.action: Close the schools and cancel next year exams.
attributes.additional_details:
There are 21% of secondary schools counted as not fully open - up from 18% the previous week and 8% in mid-September.

This is usually because they have sent home pupils in response to Covid cases.

About 7% of primary schools had to send home pupils, up from 5%.
attributes.background: Cancel next year's exam. School disruption getting worse in England. Specially in north west and north England. We want the teachers and students to stay safe. Rather than catching the virus and spreading it.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
